events.title: AI & Robotics Future Forum
events.description: Explore the latest innovations in AI, robotics, and embedded systems with faculty researchers and industry speakers.

events.title: Creative Arts Showcase
events.location: College of Art and Built Environment Gallery
events.description: A vibrant exhibition of paintings, installations, and digital media projects created by KNUST student artists.

events.title: Inter-College Sports Festival
events.description: Cheer for your college in football, athletics, and indoor games in the annual KNUST sports celebration.

events.title: Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
events.description: Learn how to validate startup ideas, build business models, and pitch for funding in practical sessions.

events.title: Career Fair & Internship Connect
events.description: Meet recruiters from top organizations, access internship opportunities, and get CV review support.

events.title: Health & Wellness Week Launch
events.description: Kick off wellness week with free health screening, mental health talks, and group fitness sessions.

events.title: Green Campus Sustainability Drive
events.description: Join tree planting, recycling workshops, and climate action talks aimed at building a greener KNUST campus.

events.title: Freshers Cultural Night
events.description: Enjoy performances, dance, spoken word, and multicultural showcases as freshers connect and celebrate.
